model.name: apidb_view
apidb_source
model.metadata:
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE adjustment_info ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`id`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), "Input" integer OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Input`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), Pay_Type string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Pay_Type`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Payment_Date string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Payment_Date`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Item_Total string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Item_Total`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`apidb`.`adjustment_info`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE anonymous_nis ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`id`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CIRT_DISPLAYNAME string(200) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`CIRT_DISPLAYNAME`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CABS_NAME string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`CABS_NAME`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CABS_CAST_TYPE string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`CABS_CAST_TYPE`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CABS_MEASUREDLENGTH float OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`CABS_MEASUREDLENGTH`', NATIVE_TYPE 'FLOAT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CABS_STATUS string(30) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`CABS_STATUS`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CABC_NUMBER integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`CABC_NUMBER`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`apidb`.`anonymous_nis`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE anonymous_tbl ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`id`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), customer_name string(200) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`customer_name`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), address clob(65535) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`address`', NATIVE_TYPE 'TEXT'), service_type string(100) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`service_type`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), service_status string(20) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`service_status`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`apidb`.`anonymous_tbl`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE billing_account_number ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`id`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), "Input" string(100) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Input`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), "Output" string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Output`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`apidb`.`billing_account_number`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE billing_info ( accountno string(100) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`accountno`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Name string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Name`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), To_Email string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`To_Email`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CC_Email string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`CC_Email`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Address string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Address`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Mobile string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Mobile`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Bill_Media string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Bill_Media`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Bill_Type string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Bill_Type`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Bill_Cycle string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Bill_Cycle`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Current_Outstanding string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Current_Outstanding`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(accountno) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`apidb`.`billing_info`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE billing_payment_info ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`id`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), "Input" string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Input`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Pay_Type string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Pay_Type`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Payment_Date string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Payment_Date`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Item_Total string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Item_Total`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`apidb`.`billing_payment_info`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE cdr_splitter_info ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`id`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), "Input" string(100) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Input`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Status string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Status`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Activation_Date string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Activation_Date`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Termination_Date string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Termination_Date`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`apidb`.`cdr_splitter_info`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE champeon_order_activity ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`id`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), Siebel_Order_Number string(20) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Siebel_Order_Number`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Order_Type string(30) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Order_Type`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Activity_Name string(50) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Activity_Name`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Workgroup string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Workgroup`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Activity_Status string(30) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Activity_Status`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), Service_ID string(50) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`Service_ID`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`apidb`.`champeon_order_activity`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE codescyclone_asset_info ( COCD integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`COCD`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), ASSET string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`ASSET`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ASSET_DESCRIPTION string(50) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`ASSET_DESCRIPTION`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), FIRST_ACQ string(50) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`FIRST_ACQ`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), LOCATION string(50) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`LOCATION`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ADDRESS_1 string(50) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`ADDRESS_1`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ADDRESS_2 string(50) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`ADDRESS_2`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ADDRESS_3 string(50) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`ADDRESS_3`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ADDRESS_4 string(50) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`ADDRESS_4`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), ASSET_OWNER_ID string(15) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`ASSET_OWNER_ID`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), FULL_NAME string(100) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`FULL_NAME`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(ASSET) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`apidb`.`codescyclone_asset_info`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')
CREATE FOREIGN TABLE dlcm_info ( id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`id`', NATIVE_TYPE 'INT', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), STAFF_NUMBER string(20) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`STAFF_NUMBER`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), LAPTOP_MAC_ADDR string(20) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`LAPTOP_MAC_ADDR`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), LAPTOP_SERIAL_NO string(20) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`LAPTOP_SERIAL_NO`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`apidb`.`dlcm_info`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')

string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`category`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), sub_category string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`sub_category`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), business_strategy string(200) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`business_strategy`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), target_completion_date timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`target_completion_date`', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATETIME', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), planned_start timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`planned_start`', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATETIME', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), planned_end timestamp NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`planned_end`', NATIVE_TYPE 'DATETIME', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), impact string(30) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`impact`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), urgency string(30) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`urgency`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), priority string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`priority`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), closure_code string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`closure_code`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), closure_comment clob(65535) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`closure_comment`', NATIVE_TYPE 'TEXT'), task1 string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`task1`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), status1 string(20) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`status1`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), category1 string(30) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`category1`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), task_owner1 string(100) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`task_owner1`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), task2 string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`task2`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), status2 string(20) NOT OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`task_owner2`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), task3 string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`task3`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), status3 string(20) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE category4 string(30) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`category4`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), task_owner4 string(100) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`task_owner4`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(IRIS_no) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`apidb`.`git_saber_tbl`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')

OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`CIRT_COMMENT`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CIRH_PARENT string(20) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`CIRH_PARENT`', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CIRH_CHILD string(20) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE
